turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, how are you doing? I'm getting hungry so I want to get some pizzas from Bella Luna. You want to help set up an order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want I need to get four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know for the first one let's just make it classic pepperoni and then for the second one I want sausage and bell pepper and also garlic.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the third one, make that one a meatball and Canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then the last one, can you make that one just a veggie lovers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 sausage, bell pepper and garlic, 1 meatball and canadian bacon, and 1 veggie lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is that I I want to make sure I want to make sure that you know I want thin crust for all of those. Does that change the price any?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, thin crust does not change the price, just gluten free option and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I see.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well then, go ahead and put the order in for those four thin crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Why not I'm I'm going to be out and about, so I'll go pick them up. When do you think it'll be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I think that's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool.
